faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quickly find answers to the most common questions about Splitizy

general.question: What is Splitizy?
general.answer: Splitizy is an innovative mobile application dedicated to sharing movable goods (furniture). It helps you create a detailed inventory of goods, obtain informative and objective value for most photographed goods, make professional evaluations, and perform fair distribution among all group members.

general.question: How does Splitizy work?
general.answer:
1. Create a group with other heirs
2. Photograph and catalog all goods
3. Evaluate or have objects appraised
4. Choose your favorites (maximum 5 favorites per person)
5. Mark objects that have sentimental value for you
6. Perform final distribution according to a chosen method

general.question: Is the application free?
general.answer: Splitizy offers a free version limited to 30 objects and 4 members per group, ideal for testing the application. For more extensive use, the Premium license at ‚Ç¨99 unlocks all features without limitation.

general.question: What languages are supported?
general.answer:
Currently, our application supports the following languages:

- Fran√ßais
- English
- Nederlands

general.question: How can I use the application in my preferred language?
general.answer:
1. Click on the "Settings" tab at the bottom of your screen
2. Press the first button in the list: "Language"
3. Select your preferred language
4. The language change happens automatically

general.question: On which devices can I use Splitizy?
general.answer: Splitizy is available on iOS and Android. You can download the application from the App Store or Google Play. An Internet connection is required to synchronize data between group members.

general.question: Is my data secure?
general.answer: Yes, the security of your data is our priority. All data is hosted on secure servers in Belgium, compliant with GDPR. No transfer is made outside the European Union.

connexion.question: How to create an account?
connexion.answer:
You can create an account in three ways:
‚Ä¢ With your email address and a password
‚Ä¢ Via your Google account
‚Ä¢ Via your Apple account (on iOS)

You will then need to provide your first name, last name, and date of birth to finalize your profile.

connexion.question: What are the password criteria?
connexion.answer: Your password must contain minimum 8 characters, at least one uppercase letter and one number. It cannot exceed 128 characters. These criteria ensure the security of your account.

connexion.question: I forgot my password, what should I do?
connexion.answer: On the login page, click on "Forgot password". Enter your email address and you will receive a link to reset your password. Also check your spam folder if you don't receive the email.

connexion.question: How to change my password?
connexion.answer: Go to Settings > My profile, then to the "Password" section. You will need to enter your current password then the new one. This option is only available for accounts created with email/password.

connexion.question: How to delete my account?
connexion.answer: In Settings > My profile, scroll down to the "Delete account" section. Warning: this action is irreversible and will delete all your data.

licence.question: What is the difference between the free and Premium version?
licence.answer:
Free version: Up to 30 objects, 4 members maximum

Premium version: Unlimited inventory, unlimited members, full access to expertise, official final distribution, professional PDF/Excel exports.

licence.question: How much does the Premium license cost?
licence.answer: The Premium license costs ‚Ç¨99 for the entire group with a one-time payment. The license is valid for 3 years, giving you all the time needed to perform the distribution.

licence.question: How to buy the Premium license?
licence.answer: The purchase is made directly in the application via the "Upgrade group to Premium version" button visible at the top of the screen in the "Settings" and "Group" tabs for free groups. Secure payment is made via Google Pay on Android and Apple Pay on iOS. Activation is immediate.

licence.question: When and how is my Premium license consumed?
licence.answer: One (1) unique Splitizy usage license starts automatically upon purchase. It is "consumed" automatically after launching the sharing algorithm of your choice OR after a total inactivity of the Group for a period of 12 months.

licence.question: What should I do if I want to restart the sharing?
licence.answer: If you want to restart the sharing, you will need to purchase and activate a new unique Splitizy license and proceed with the different steps: Group Creation, Inventory Creation, Inventory Locking, Choice of a distribution method, Launch of sharing.

groupe.question: How to create a group?
groupe.answer: After creating your account, you can create a group by clicking on "Create a group". Give it a name, choose a language, country and currency, then invite other members by sharing the automatically generated invitation link.

groupe.question: How to invite members to my group?
groupe.answer: In the "Group" tab, copy the invitation link and share it via SMS, email or any other application. People will be able to join the group by clicking on this link. You can then define their role (Administrator, Member or Guest).

groupe.question: What are the different roles in a group?
groupe.answer:
‚Ä¢ Administrator: Can manage everything (add/remove members, configure the group, access all features)
‚Ä¢ Member: Can add objects, evaluate, participate in distribution
‚Ä¢ Guest: Read-only access, can view inventory but not modify it

groupe.question: How to change groups?
groupe.answer: If you are a member of multiple groups, go to the "Group" tab and click on the change icon next to the desired group name. You can also join new groups via invitation links.

groupe.question: What currency to use?
groupe.answer: We invite you to select your usual currency for ease of use and object valuation.

groupe.question: Can we use different currencies in the same Group?
groupe.answer: Yes. Splitizy handles converting values to each user's chosen currency. Currency exchange rates refer to ExchangeRate-API.

inventaire.question: How to add an object to the inventory?
inventaire.answer: In the "Inventory" tab, click the "+" button to add a new object. You can take photos, give a name, description, assign a room, category and estimate a value. Adding quality photos is strongly recommended.

inventaire.question: How many photos can I add per object?
inventaire.answer: You can add maximum 10 photos per object to document it from all angles. Photos can be taken directly from the camera or imported from your gallery. Favor sharp and well-lit photos for better expertise.

inventaire.question: How to organize my inventory?
inventaire.answer: You can organize your inventory with rooms, categories and tags. You can also filter by favorites, expertised or archived objects. A search system allows you to easily find an object by its name or description.

inventaire.question: What is an archived object?
inventaire.answer: An archived object is an object that will not participate in the distribution (for example: broken object, worthless, already distributed). It remains visible in the inventory for documentation but does not appear in distribution calculations.

inventaire.question: What is a Tag?
inventaire.answer: A tag (or label, marker, label) is a keyword or term associated with information (for example a material, a place, or a first name), which describes a characteristic of the object and/or allows easy grouping of information containing the same keywords.

expertise.question: What is the expertise service?
expertise.answer: The expertise service allows you to have your objects evaluated by qualified professional experts. They analyze your photos and descriptions to provide an official value estimate. This service is paid and costs ‚Ç¨39.99 per object.

expertise.question: How does AI estimation work?
expertise.answer: Artificial intelligence can analyze photos of your objects and provide a preliminary estimate of their value. This estimate is indicative and does not replace the expertise of a qualified professional for an official evaluation.

expertise.question: How much does an expertise cost?
expertise.answer: The cost of an expertise is ‚Ç¨39.99 per object. Payment is made directly in the application via Google Pay (for Android) or Apple Pay (for iOS) depending on your device's operating system.

repartition.question: How does distribution work?
repartition.answer:
Once the inventory is completed and locked by all members, a group administrator can launch the distribution by choosing one of 4 methods:

- Reverse Round Robin
- Single File
- Simple Round Robin
- Random Draw

The algorithm then proposes an equitable distribution taking into account the value and preferences and sentimental attachment of each person.

repartition.question: Can I go back after launching the distribution?
repartition.answer: Once the distribution is launched, it is not possible to go back. Your inventory is locked and can no longer be modified.

repartition.question: What happens after launching the distribution?
repartition.answer:
After launching the distribution, each group member receives an email detailing their basket as well as the total sharing. The detail will be integrated into a PDF appendix document.

Don't forget to check your SPAM if you don't see the email appear in your inbox.

repartition.question: Why is distribution irreversible?
repartition.answer: To guarantee the impartiality of the process, the distribution is final and cannot be modified. This approach ensures fairness of sharing by preventing any subsequent manipulation of results, thus guaranteeing a fair and transparent sharing accepted by all.

services.question: What additional services are available?
services.answer:
Splitizy offers paid virtual expertise services performed by professionals and free moving quote services to facilitate the distribution of goods after distribution.

The virtual expertise report may contain an invitation to opt for an in-person expertise when necessary.

services.question: How to contact an expert for an in-person expertise?
services.answer: When requesting expertise, you can choose the option "Have the expert contact me". The application will connect you with an expert in your region who will contact you directly to arrange an appointment.

donnees.question: How long is my data kept?
donnees.answer: Your data is kept for 3 years after the last use of the application. You can request a copy of your data before their destruction or proceed with early deletion from your account settings.

donnees.question: With whom is my data shared?
donnees.answer: Your data is only shared with members of your group and, only with your explicit consent, with additional service providers (experts, movers) that you solicit.

donnees.question: How to permanently delete my data?
donnees.answer:
To permanently delete your account and all your personal data:

1. Go to Settings > Account Settings
2. Scroll down to the bottom of the profile page
3. Click on "Delete my account"
4. Confirm your choice

‚ö†Ô∏è Warning: This action is irreversible and will permanently delete all your data (inventories, photos, histories). Deletion is effective immediately.

support.question: How to contact support?
support.answer: You can contact us via Settings > Contact us in the application, or directly by email at support@splitizy.com. Our team will respond to you as soon as possible.

support.question: The application is not working properly, what to do?
support.answer: First try to restart the application or check your Internet connection. If the problem persists, contact us via support describing precisely the problem encountered. Remember to mention your device model and application version.

support.question: Can I recover a group deleted by mistake?
support.answer: Group deletion is generally irreversible. However, quickly contact our support at support@splitizy.com specifying the group ID. In some cases, recovery may be possible.

The "GDPR": Regulation (EU) 2016/679 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, also known as the General Data Protection Regulation
The "Additional Services": means as provided for in article 4 of the Splitizy License Agreement;
definitions.conclusion: All terms used in this privacy policy that are derived from the GDPR, such as "processor", "controller" and "joint controllers", are understood in accordance with the definitions appearing in the GDPR.

SPLITIZY complies with the GDPR.
dataController.commitment: SPLITIZY attaches great importance to the secure, transparent and confidential collection and processing of your personal data. This privacy policy aims to inform you clearly about how your personal data is processed in the context of using the SPLITIZY Application.
dataController.contact: You can contact SPLITIZY at the following address: privacy@splitizy.com

dataCollection.title: 3. WHAT DATA IS COLLECTED, WHY AND ON WHAT LEGAL BASIS?
dataCollection.intro: SPLITIZY may collect and process personal data in the context of the processing activities listed below.
dataCollection.noAutomation: No automated processing or decision-making based exclusively on automated processing, including profiling, is performed by SPLITIZY in the context of using the Application.

3.1.title: 3.1. Data collected when creating a user account
content: When you create an account on the SPLITIZY Application, whether as an administrator or as a member joining a group, certain personal data is required to allow access to the service features. You are specifically asked to provide your last name, first name, email address and date of birth.
This information is necessary to create and manage your user account, authenticate your identity, allow you to join a group or create one, and access the services provided by SPLITIZY.
This processing is based on the execution of the contract, i.e. the provision of the service (article 6(1)(b) GDPR).

3.2.title: 3.2. Optional data: profile picture
content: When creating your account, you are also offered, on an optional basis, to upload a profile picture. This data allows for personalization of the user experience and facilitates the identification of members within sharing groups.
This processing is based on your explicit consent (article 6(1)(a) GDPR), which you can withdraw at any time by deleting your photo.
Similarly, if you use additional services, we process information related to them and that you communicate through the Application (date and time of request, amount, information transmitted).

3.3.title: 3.3. Data collected in the context of inheritance sharing services
content: The Application allows you to use an inheritance sharing service and an asset expertise service assisted by artificial intelligence. To enable this service, you must provide an inventory of assets to be shared, including photographs of these assets and details about their value. This information is necessary for the proper functioning of the inheritance sharing tool offered by SPLITIZY.
This processing is based on the execution of the contract, namely the provision of the service (article 6(1)(b) GDPR).

3.4.title: 3.4. Data collected in the context of technical support
content: When you contact our technical support service, we may process a set of personal data in order to respond effectively to your request. This includes identification data (last name, first name, email, date of birth), any photographs transmitted, as well as elements of the inheritance sharing service (inventory, photos of assets, comments, asset valuation, etc.).
This data is processed only to the extent necessary to provide personalized technical assistance.
The legal basis for this processing is the execution of the contract, i.e. the provision of the service (article 6(1)(b) GDPR).

3.5.title: 3.5. Data collected for connecting with third-party providers
content: If you choose to activate the optional service of connecting with (1) an authorized expert for an on-site expertise or (2) a moving service, SPLITIZY will share your email address, phone number, postal address and inventory with this provider. This transmission allows the expert to contact you directly to arrange an appointment or intervention.
This processing is based exclusively on your explicit consent (article 6(1)(a) GDPR), which will be requested at the time of the connection request.

dataRetention.title: 4. HOW LONG DO WE KEEP YOUR PERSONAL DATA?
dataRetention.content: SPLITIZY limits the retention of your personal data to the period necessary to accomplish the purposes for which it was collected, including to satisfy legal and accounting requirements and, where applicable, to ensure the defense of its interests in legal proceedings until the extinction of said proceedings.
dataRetention.retention: Data necessary for the provision of services is retained for three years from the last use of the Application, unless a longer period is necessary to ensure SPLITIZY's legal defense or to respond to legal obligations.
dataRetention.deletion: At the end of the applicable retention period, SPLITIZY will destroy your personal data definitively and in accordance with applicable laws and regulations. You will have the possibility to request a copy of your personal data before their destruction.

dataSharing.title: 5. WITH WHOM IS YOUR PERSONAL DATA SHARED?
dataSharing.intro: In order to provide certain services offered via the SPLITIZY Application, your personal data may be transmitted to third-party providers of Additional Services, as referenced below. This sharing is strictly limited to the data necessary for the purpose of the service and always relies on an appropriate legal basis, including your explicit consent.
dataSharing.noInternationalTransfer: No transfer of your personal data is made outside the European Union. All data is hosted on secure servers located in Belgium.

5.1.title: 5.1. Sharing with an authorized expert (remote expertise)
content: When you choose to use an authorized expert for remote expertise via the Application, SPLITIZY transmits to this expert restricted access to the information necessary to accomplish their mission. This includes the inventory of assets to be shared, corresponding photographs and, where applicable, information about their value.

No data allowing identification of group members (last name, first name, contact details, date of birth) is communicated to the expert. The expert acts solely from descriptive data to propose a distribution.
The purpose of this sharing is strictly limited to the provision of the service, based on contract execution (article 6(1)(b) GDPR).

5.2.title: 5.2. Sharing with an authorized expert (on-site expertise)
content: If you opt for on-site support by an authorized expert, SPLITIZY shares your phone number with this provider to enable your connection.
The sharing of this data is based on your consent (article 6(1)(a) GDPR), expressed at the time of your connection request.

5.3.title: 5.3. Sharing with a moving company
content: If you request a moving service offered via the Application, SPLITIZY transmits the information necessary for connection with a specialized provider. This includes your last name, first name, email address, date of birth, possibly your profile picture, phone number, as well as pickup and destination addresses. The moving company also receives the inventory of assets to be transported, associated photos, volume (in m¬≥) and, when available, their valuation after sharing.

The objective is to allow the provider to correctly evaluate the request, plan the transport and contact you directly to organize the intervention. This sharing is also based on your consent (article 6(1)(a) GDPR), collected during your connection request.

5.4.title: 5.4. Responsibility of third-party providers
content: SPLITIZY is responsible for transmitting your data to third-party providers of Additional Services. SPLITIZY is not responsible for the use of your data by these third-party providers, nor for the security or confidentiality practices of such third-party providers. Once the connection is made, the third-party provider will be the sole point of contact with you, and will be solely responsible for responding to requests for exercising your rights.

5.5.title: 5.5. No international transfers
content: No transfer of your personal data is made outside the European Union. All data is hosted on secure servers located in Belgium.

userRights.title: 6. WHAT ARE YOUR RIGHTS?
userRights.intro: In accordance with the GDPR, you have the following rights:
rights: 1. Right of access: you have the right to consult and, within reason, to consult the personal data that SPLITIZY processes about you and to verify for what purposes they are used.

2. Right of rectification: you have the right to obtain the rectification (correction) of inaccurate personal data concerning you as well as the right to complete incomplete personal data concerning you.
3. Right of opposition: you have the right to object to the processing of personal data concerning you for serious and legitimate reasons.
4. Right to be forgotten or to erasure of data: you have the right to request SPLITIZY to erase your personal data.
5. Right to withdraw your consent: in case of processing of personal data based on your consent, this consent can be withdrawn.
6. Right to data portability: you have the right to receive the personal data concerning you that you have provided to SPLITIZY, in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format.

7. Right to lodge a complaint: In case of a dispute concerning your privacy, SPLITIZY undertakes to do everything possible to find an amicable solution with you. You can lodge a complaint with the competent supervisory authority (https://www.autoriteprotectiondonnees.be/).
userRights.contact: You can exercise the above rights free of charge by contacting: privacy@splitizy.com

security.title: 7. SECURITY MEASURES
security.content: SPLITIZY takes technical and organizational measures to process data at a sufficient level of security and to protect your personal data against destruction, loss, falsification, unauthorized access or notification to third parties by error as well as unauthorized processing of this data.

modifications.title: 8. MODIFICATIONS TO THIS POLICY
modifications.content: From time to time, this privacy policy will be modified, for example in the context of modifications to the services provided. At the time of publication of modifications to the privacy policy, the date of the "last update" will be modified at the bottom of the document and you will be informed in advance (for example, email notification).

applicableLaw.title: 9. APPLICABLE LAW AND DISPUTES
applicableLaw.content: This privacy policy is governed by Belgian law. All disputes relating to this privacy policy fall under the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Brussels, Belgium. The competent supervisory authority for any complaint is the Data Protection Authority (https://www.autoriteprotectiondonnees.be/)

yourRight.title: Your right to data deletion
yourRight.content: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to request the erasure of your personal data. Splitizy respects this right and offers you the possibility to easily delete your account and all associated data directly from the application.

important.title: Important:
important.content: Deleting your account will result in the permanent loss of all your data, including your inventories, photos, and distribution histories. This action is irreversible.

howToDelete.title: How to delete your account and your data
howToDelete.intro: To permanently delete your Splitizy account and all your personal data, follow these simple steps:

steps.title: Step 1: Access the application
content: Open the Splitizy application on your mobile device
Log in to your account with your usual credentials

steps.title: Step 2: Access your profile
content: Navigate to the "Settings" tab in the main menu
Click on "Account Settings"
You will then access your profile page

steps.title: Step 3: Delete your account
content: Once on your profile page, scroll down to the bottom of the page
Locate the "Delete my account" button at the bottom of the page
Click on this button to initiate the deletion procedure
Confirm your choice when the application asks you to

afterDeletion.title: What happens after deletion?
items: All your personal data (name, first name, email, profile photo, etc.) is immediately deleted
All your inventories, property photos and distribution histories are permanently erased
Your access to the application is immediately revoked
If you were part of a sharing group, you will be automatically removed from it
No trace of your account will remain in our systems

deletionTime.title: Deletion timeframe
deletionTime.content: The deletion of your data is effective immediately after confirmation. However, it may take up to 30 days for all backup copies to also be deleted from our security systems.

needHelp.title: Need help?
needHelp.content: If you encounter difficulties deleting your account or if you have questions about deleting your data, please do not hesitate to contact us:
needHelp.response: Our team will respond to you as soon as possible to assist you in this process.

otherRights.title: Other rights relating to your data
otherRights.content: In addition to the right to deletion, you have other rights concerning your personal data. To learn more, consult our Privacy Policy which details all your rights under the GDPR.
